com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interface ClusterConfigService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterConfigServiceJPAImpl

    @Validated
public interface ClusterConfigService
    Abstraction layer to encapsulate data ClusterConfig functionality.
    Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe

      • getClusters

        java.util.List<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Cluster> getClusters(java.lang.String name,
                                                                   java.util.Set<com.netflix.genie.common.model.ClusterStatus> statuses,
                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                   java.lang.Long minUpdateTime,
                                                                   java.lang.Long maxUpdateTime,
                                                                   int page,
                                                                   int limit,
                                                                   boolean descending,
                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderBys)
        Get cluster info for various parameters. Null or empty parameters are ignored.
        Parameters:
        name - cluster name
        statuses - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        tags - tags allocated to this cluster
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster configuration was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster configuration was updated
        page - page number
        limit - number of entries to return
        descending - Whether the results should be returned in descending or ascending order
        orderBys - The fields to order the results by
        Returns:
        All the clusters matching the criteria
